title: file with same name uploaded via web interface, undesired results
body:
### expected behaviour
file with same name is uploaded by web interface.  when user selects replace, old file is replaced with new one.

### actual behaviour
old file is not replaced, and a new file is created with (2) in the name.

### steps to reproduce
1. install oc 506
2. install win7 client 1.3.0beta1
3. upload file by web interface, wait for file to populate via sync client to client machine.
4. create new file with same name and upload by web interface, make sure to click "replace". see new file (2) created in client sync folder and web interface, and (2) file is not in server file system.

### server configuration
operating system: win8

web server: iis8

database:mysql

php version:5.3

owncloud version:5.0.6

### client configuration
client version: 1.3.0beta1

operating system: win7

os language: english

installation path of client: default
